about_the_game:
A New Reign of Khaos unfolds in Liu Kang's Era. This pack includes the upcoming Story Expansion + Kombat Pack 2*.

Available at Launch:
Noob Saibot
Cyrax
Sektor

Available Post-Launch (includes 1 week early access):
Ghostface (Scream Franchise)
T-1000 (Terminator 2)
Conan the Barbarian

*Separate Kombat Pack 2 character bundle not available

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content
